summary: Completed frontend testing of HR Hub Indigo-style redesign. Admin login successful, Indigo layout renders correctly with all 8 parity modules, HR operations tiles are clickable and functional. Found company branding issue that needs to be addressed.

ui_bugs.issue: Company name 'Caviar & Bull' and 'Marvin Gauci' visible in navigation area
ui_bugs.requirement_violation: Requirement states 'No company name shown in HR description' but venue branding is visible

design_issues.issue: Venue/company branding should be removed from HR Hub as per requirements

passed_tests: HR Hub loads with Indigo-style layout
All 8 Indigo modules present (Dashboards, HR, Payroll & Leave, Document Manager, Attendance, Approval System, Insights, Administration)
HR coverage grid displays correctly with parity headings
All 10 HR operation tiles are clickable and functional
Navigation between HR sections works correctly
Indigo color scheme and styling properly applied
action_item_for_main_agent: Remove company/venue branding ('Caviar & Bull' and 'Marvin Gauci') from HR Hub navigation/header area to meet requirement of no company name in HR description
